com.viaoa.jfc.control
Class JFCController

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.hub.HubListenerAdapter
      com.viaoa.jfc.control.JFCController
All Implemented Interfaces:
HubListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ButtonController, ComboBoxController, CustomComboBoxController, DateChooserController, FormattedTextFieldController, HTMLTextPaneController, LabelController, ListController, TextAreaController, TextFieldController, ToggleButtonController
public class JFCController
extends HubListenerAdapter

Implements the HubListener and provides most of the methods required for creating controller Classes (Model/View/Controller) for UI components.

Used by the OA "Hub2XXX" to be able to bind a component to a Hub, so that both the Hub and the component automatically work together.

For more information about this package, see documentation.

getActualHub

public Hub getActualHub()
Returns the Hub that this component is working with. If property path has reference properties (links), then a Hub will be returned that matches the Class for the last property.

k Example:
Hub with ObjectClass = Order.class
property path "order.cust.salesrep.name"
will have a property name = "name" and actualHub with ObjectClass = SalesRep.class

getObject

public java.lang.Object getObject()
Returns the Object that is being used. Internally, it will be "wrapped" in a temporary Hub and made the active object for that temporary Hub.

setObject

public void setObject(java.lang.Object obj)
The Object that is being used. It will be "wrapped" in a temporary Hub.

setPropertyPath

public void setPropertyPath(java.lang.String s)
A dot (".") separated list of property names that are used to navigate from an object to a property value. OA uses Java Reflection to dynamically access the value.

Example:
A property path to retrieve an employees department manager's last name: "department.manager.lastName"

getPropertyPath

public java.lang.String getPropertyPath()

resetActualHub

protected void resetActualHub()
20120821 Find any hub in the propertyPath to use as the actualHub. This is when a propertyPath is used to get a hub from another reference object. Example: from Employee -> dept.employees.fullName

getLastMethod

public java.lang.reflect.Method getLastMethod()
Returns methods used to get value using property path. public Method[] getGetMethods() { if (getMethods == null) { getMethods = OAReflect.getMethods(hub.getObjectClass(), propertyPath); } return getMethods; }

setValidationMethod

public boolean setValidationMethod(java.lang.Class delegteClass,
                                   java.lang.String methodName)
Sets up the validation delegate class to use for validating changes.

Parameters:
delegteClass -
propertyName - must be for a method that access object and new value, and returns null, boolean. If it returns a String, then it will be used as the error message text.
Returns:
true if method was found, else false.

update

public void update(javax.swing.JComponent comp,
                   java.lang.Object value)

update

protected void update()
Called to have component update itself. By default, should call updateEnabled, updateVisible Most subclasses will then call update(comp, value) to update component icon/colors/font,etc
